How does Atrazine work?
I mean, how does this chemical turn a male frog into a female?

Well, in part, we're still working on that, but what we believe now is that Atrazine turns on an enzyme called aromatase, and this enzyme is the machinery, if you will, that converts testosterone into estrogen.
